= Why isn't this project a part of maven-scm-plugin proper? =
For full details, see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LEGAL-45

SVNKit's license ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sleepycat_License Sleepycat]) is simply not compatible with the ASF license.  So it's impossible to distribute a product under the ASF license with svnkit included.  But adding it as a maven dependency is different.
